alert.note: Alert for Maryland Beaches (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued October 01 at 3:03PM EDT until October 02 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...A high risk for rip currents. * WHERE...The Maryland Beaches. * WHEN...Through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions expected. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. OCEAN CITY INLET MD MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.0 FT, MODERATE 5.0 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 2.5 FT, MAJOR 3.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/02 PM 3.8 1.3 1.2 1 NONE 02/01 AM 3.3 0.8 1.1 1 NONE 02/02 PM 4.2 1.7 1.5 1 MINOR 03/01 AM 4.6 2.1 2.5 1 MINOR 03/03 PM 4.8 2.3 2.1 1 MINOR 04/03 AM 4.4 1.9 2.2 1 MINOR &&
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions.
